title: Turkey stuffed kohlrabi
ingredients: ['4 medium kohlrabi', 'oil, as needed for cooking', '1 onion, chopped', '3 mushrooms, chopped', '100g cooked rice', '250g minced turkey', '1/2 bunch dill, chopped', '1 teaspoon herbes de Provence', '1 teaspoon dried basil', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 teaspoons unsalted butter']
